mdRecord.dcterms:title: Criminal Warrants, Justice of the Peace: Commonwealth vs James M. Lawson
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Commonwealth vs James M. Lawson Offense: Assault and battery- charged with a Misdemeaner Victim: Susan M. Lawson, daughter of James Lawson Complainant: James F. Shelor Recorded in Floyd County Courthouse 04.16.1887 Costs: $7.50 fine, court cost $5.40 Lawson plead guilty, refused bond and was jailed for 1 year
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
Warrants (Law)
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
